stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  SO MANY PAPERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: As someone who has always had an A\'s in all my Eng. Classes, this is literally the hardest class I have ever taken. She makes really remarks at people who ask questions that she thinks have obvious answers. She doesn\'t lecture, she only assigns stuff and expects us to pass. Only good thing is the extra credit opportunities.

comments: She takes pride in having a hard class, and isn\'t a very good instructor. She doesn\'t give good examples, yet expects your papers to be flawless. If you take her class prepare for a stressful semester.

stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: I tried with all my might to get and A! Mrs. Mora\'s ENG1A class was, hands down,the hardest class I have ever taken. You must be self-sufficient, a quick learner, and ask clear relevant questions.I believe she does care about her students, and there is fun class time, but personally, I\'d rather it be boring and get an A #PainIsTemporaryGPAisForever

stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  CARING  TOUGH GRADER
comments: the class had so many essays which wasn\'t that hard but it was just a lot. Everyone in my class was stressed out and 2 girls were crying because of all the work. i didn\'t think it was THAT bad but i\'d say if you take ms mora don\'t take any other class that semester because you\'ll need to dedicate all your time to this class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  SO MANY PAPERS (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: The thing i didn\'t like was that when she graded our papers she made rude snarky notes that made me embarrassed to write anything. For example, she wanted our titles to be funny/clever or else she would comment "boring" next to it. Her class wasn\'t HARD but i didn\'t like being put down by notes on my papers. She was just very picky.

stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: Was very strict when it comes to the assignments. But if you try your best you will be rewarded. Would recommend if you\'re looking to challenge yourself, and she makes that real clear the first day. If you\'re looking to just pass by doing minimum work then i wouldn\'t recommend. Very good teacher though and a lot of easy extra credit might I add!!!

comments: I took 1A over the summer and I really liked her. She gives good feedback for your future papers and I didn\'t find her to be a tough grader. I would definitely recommend, she is very sweet and caring.

comments: I highly recommend Mrs. Mora as a teacher. She tells you what to expect for the semester on the first day. She may seem a little intimidating at first, but she is actually a very sweet woman. She cares about her students. If you need help on anything, just ask her and she\'ll help Make sure you do the work on time and do the readings for the quizzes

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  SO MANY PAPERS (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: This woman changed my life. If you work hard, you will learn to write better at work and other classes as well. Also, I now write to my family and I participate in government by writing to our representatives. I mostly have her to thank. Glenda Mora is an absolutely caring teacher and it was a pleasure to take her class.
